data.title: puts forward-lit #targetname assignment of faux diffuse maps back
OpenGL bug on parallax terrain
data.body:
There is a graphic bug when you are in OpenGL rendering and looking at terrain textures with parallax, you can sometimes see little hairlines between the polygons, does not matter if parallax is on or not, it happens when you activate the terrain textures for parallax.
It looks like this: http://i.imgur.com/og1Xoub.jpg

Crash on "add a new mesh" Forest Editor action

Bob.setImageTrigger(0,1); does not rapid firing

This command tells the weapon to start rapid firing, but it's only shoot once.

`Bob.setImageTrigger(0,1);`

Caused by:

data.title: Makes vehicles work with the physics plugins.
data.body:
Makes vehicles create a basic physics body when using one of the physics plugins so that they can collide with other physics-enabled objects.

Based on @rextimmy 's work.

(Resubmitted due to git shenanigans)

data.title: Makes vehicles work with the physics plugins.
data.body:
Makes vehicles create a basic physics body when using one of the physics plugins so that they can collide with other physics-enabled objects.

Based on @rextimmy 's work.

data.title: Static SDL and File Dialog Flag control
data.body:
Switches SDL to be statically linked, as well as having TORQUE_PLAYER a flag to control if the file dialogs are utilized.

The understanding being that if the build is set as intended to just be for playing, the toolchain won't be utilized, and thus the file dialogs are unneeded.

data.title: Named Textures don't work with translucent materials.
Fixes some bullet physics issues with the player class
data.body: When using bullet physics, it ensures the player does not move when the world sim is paused, as well as correcting the surface check when walking to test against the max run angle.

data.title: httpObject crashes game when trying to delete object
data.body:
As the issue implies, anytime I create an httpObject and go to delete it, I get an access violation crash. 

"Exception thrown at 0x206F7420 in Torque3D.exe: 0xC0000005: Access violation executing location 0x206F7420."

Regrettably not using a debug build, will compile one later and reproduce.

data.title: add loop playback to GuiTheoraCtrl
Fixes vertcolor code insertion order, and
data.body: applies it adaptively based on defered or forward lit context

data.title: Fixes the drawUtil rendering of polyhedrons
data.body: Fixes the drawUtil rendering of polyhedrons by correcting the index ordering to work with triangleStrip as opposed to Fan.

data.title: Bug space folder in scene tree 2
data.body: Bug space folder in scene tree Fix by David Robert Pemberton https://www.garagegames.com/community/blogs/view/22295 Before, the space break up the folder in to 2 folders. Bug fix: Now you can see the folder "soldier actor" as one folder.

data.title: Is documented somewhere the coding standards?
data.body:
Is documented somewhere the coding standards?

I mean contribution guidelines...
- TorqueScript coding standard and style guide.
- C++ coding standard and style guide.
- Documentation and Wikis standard.

data.title: Entity/Component implementation
data.body:
Adds a (experimental-flagged) Entity/Component system to Torque 3D.

Can be activated via the advanced property TORQUE_EXPERIMENTAL_EC in cmake.

Note: Currently requires one of the Physics APIs(Bullet or PhysX) to be active as well to use any of the physics/collisions components.

data.title: Update coverPoint.cpp
data.body: Assuming you can't peek in more than one direction at a time, in cases where the peek direction isn't "over", this'll decrease the amount of checks performed. There were previously three if statements, the program would have to run through the other ones even if the first one was satisfied.

data.title: missing samplerstate configurations with empty
data.body: Implements #1590 with the changes duplicated in the Empty template as well.
